instruction: Pick up the ramekin.
Grasp the silver bowl on the square.
Move the plate to the left.
Please place the cookies next to the ramekin.
Carefully lift the second silver bowl.
Rotate the bowl on the square 90 degrees.
Open the drawer.
Transfer the cookies to the plate.
Could you position the second silver bowl on top of the square?
Examine the ramekin closely.
Release the plate.
Gently place the cube in the bowl.
Move the plate to the top of the dark box.
Pick up the bowl.
Rotate the cube 90 degrees.
Stack the two bowls.
Move 5 cm forward.
Lift the plate 10 cm above the table.
Please grasp the handle of the drawer.
Carefully position the plate next to the bowl.
Pick up the smaller bowl.
Grasp the baking dish.
Please move the plate to the left.
Could you put the cookies on top of the burner?
Open the top drawer of the cabinet.
Carefully place the larger bowl inside the smaller bowl.
Rotate the burner 90 degrees clockwise.
Transfer the cookies to the plate.
Move the plate next to the baking dish.
Place the bag of cookies in the top drawer, then close the drawer
Pick up the bowl.
Grasp the small blue cube.
Move the blue cube to the plate.
Place the block on the burner.
Please carefully place the blue cube into the empty bowl.
Rotate the block 90 degrees clockwise.
Open the cabinet.
Move to the left by 10 cm.
Lift the blue block 5 inches higher.
Stack the bowls
